org.hibernate.jpa.spi

Interface HibernateEntityManagerFactoryAware

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventSource, HibernateEntityManagerImplementor, SessionImplementor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionDelegatorBaseImpl
    Deprecated. 
    (since 5.2) Why do we need an over-arching access to HibernateEntityManagerFactory across multiple contract hierarchies?

    @Deprecated
public interface HibernateEntityManagerFactoryAware
    Internal contact for things that have HibernateEntityManagerFactory access.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      HibernateEntityManagerFactory getFactory()
      Deprecated. 
      Get access to the Hibernate extended EMF contract.
